name: TurnBack
description:
(THE GAME IS QUITE BIG SO IT MAY TAKE SOME TIME TO LOAD)

(IF THE GAME DOESNT LOAD ON BROWSER THEN DOWNLOAD THE GAME)


Welcome to FutureCorp!

Here at FutureCorp there are always breakthroughs to be had. And when theres a breakthough, theres got to be a lab rat.

You have been assigned to test our new and practically unused Time warping belt™!

Use 3 time bending abilities on will, such as

◄  Rewind time  | ■ Stop time | ► Time jump 

You will be assisted by our lovely intern Hayley throughout this experiment.

Its time to think, with time.

Controls

Tab button - Pause menu.

R button - Restart level.

E on boxes to grab and throw.

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Shift to slide - Gives a speedboost in a form of a slide in the direction of movement.

Use the scroll wheel or the number keys to switch between all unlocked abilities

(1 - rewind, 2 - stop time, 3 - time jump)

Hold right click to use the picked ability, using any ability will also drain energy.

Energy regenerated 3 seconds after no use.

Credits:

Music and Sound Design - AmbientArtstyles http://demat.so/ AmbientArtstyles#1406
Voice of Hayley - Robyn Redbirb#8658
